# OverDrive 2.6: Changelog and Known Issues {#overdrive-2.6-changelog-and-known-issues .title}

[](javascript:window.print() "Print this article"){.printArticle
aria-label="Print this Article"}

Here\'s a brief summary of what\'s changed, new, and improved in our
OVERDRIVE 2.6.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

<div>

## 9-27-2021 What\'s new in Version 2.6.10?

-   Added support for Limited Edition cars in modes that include
    Overdrive cars:
    -   \"Mammoth\" - Replacement for MXT International
    -   \"Dynamo\" - Replacement for Ice Charger
    -   Nuke Phantom
-   Added support in tutorial for all Overdrive cars, where originally
    only Skull and Groundshock were allowed.
-   Fixed an issue where the campaign mode would not save/load
    information properly while playing online.
-   Updated app icon
-   Fixed an issue where iPhone clients would claim that networks were
    disconnected.
-   Removed buttons with broken links
-   Added \"Exit App\" button for convenience.

    ------------------------------------------------------------------------

## 7-28-2020 What\'s new in Version 2.6.8?

-   **Connection Fixes:**
    -   Fixed an issue where some cars would not connect to the app.
-   **UI Fixes:**\
    -   Fixed crash on app start
    -   Fixed issue where some users could not enter the Garage.
    -   UI Elements no longer appear stacked over each other in the
        Garage screen
    -   \"Learn About\...\" Buttons in Garage are now clickable
-   **Known Issues:**\
    -   App needs an \"Exit\" option in Android to make it easier for
        users to leave the app
    -   Store button leads nowhere when clicked or is unclickable (This
        will be resolved when a new Store is in place)
    -   iPhone clients claim networks are disconnected
    -   Campaign progress on some accounts may not save if synced with
        the DDL server. To work around this until resolution, make an
        Offline Account.\

        ------------------------------------------------------------------------

## 7-7-2020 What\'s new in Version 2.6.6?

-   **Login Fixes:**
    -   New text input method prevents duplication of input
    -   New text input method allows copying/pasting to text field
    -   Added \"See Password\" option for verification of correct
        password input
-   **App Load / Crash Fixes:**
    -   Sentry Error Fixed on App Loading Screen
    -   Fixed intermittent launch failures
-   **Known Issues:**
    -   UI Elements intermittently appear stacked over each other in the
        Garage screen
    -   \"Learn About\...\" Buttons in Garage are intermittently
        unclickable
    -   iPhone clients claim networks are disconnected
    -   Store button leads nowhere when clicked or is unclickable (This
        will be resolved when a new Store is in place)
    -   App needs an \"Exit\" option in Android to make it easier for
        users to leave the app

</div>
